Package adventure2D.project

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    App
    The main class of the game.
    AppTest
    This is an auto-generated test class, that appeared "by itself" when crating the project.
    Boss
    A class representing the boss of a stage.
    BossTest
    This test class does nothing as there is nothing to test, but I was told (by assistant) that all classes has to have a test-class, so...
    Character
    A class representing a character in the game's world.
    Engine
    The game's engine class that is responsible of making the game run.
    EngineTest
    A test class for testing the project's 'engine'-class.
    GameObject
    A class representing a object in the game's world.
    GameObjectTest
    This test class does nothing as there is nothing to test, but I was told (by assistant) that all classes has to have a test-class, so...
    GObject
    This class is the abstract super class for all the objects of the game (whether they are characters or other type of objects).
    GObjectTest
    This test class does test the GObject class by using the GameObject class (because GObject is abstract).
    InputManager
    This class is in charge of handling the player's inputs and managing some changes based on the inputs.
    InputManagerTest
    A class for testing the input management logic, however how it supposed one to be able to test input's reading automatically? I guess better to do it with running the game.
    Player
    A class representing the character the player controls.
    PlayerTest
    This test class does nothing as there is nothing to test, but I was told (by assistant) that all classes has to have a test-class, so...
    Stage
    This class represent a stage.
    StageTest
    This test class does test the GObject class.
